description: Used to lower cholesterol and reduce the risk of heart disease.
notes: Take with or without food. Avoid drinking large amounts of grapefruit juice while taking this medication.

description: Used to manage blood sugar levels in patients with type 2 diabetes.
notes: Take with meals to avoid stomach upset. Monitor blood sugar regularly.

description: Treats high blood pressure and heart failure.
notes: May cause dizziness. Drink plenty of water, and avoid potassium supplements unless directed.

description: Reduces stomach acid and treats conditions like GERD and ulcers.
notes: Take 30 minutes before a meal. Do not crush or chew the capsule.
